title: CheerioCrawler Template
description: Supply either taskId/actorId or direct runIds

actorOrTaskId.title: Actor or task ID
actorOrTaskId.sectionDescription: Provide an ID of an actor or task. All runs of that actor or task will be scanned. Optionally you can restrict the date when the runs started.

dateFrom.title: Date from
dateFrom.description: Optional date to limit from which date the run will be scanned. The date should be in ISO standard (e.g. 2020-10-01)

dateTo.title: Date to
dateTo.description: Optional date to limit to which date the run will be scanned. The date should be in ISO standard (e.g. 2020-10-15)

retryCount.title: Retry count of requests to rebirth (optional)
retryCount.description: Will rebirth requests with this retryCount found in the log.

resurrectRuns.title: Resurrect runs after rebirth
resurrectRuns.description: Will resurrect the runs for which requests have been rebirth

resurrectRunsConcurrency.title: Concurrency of resurrected runs
resurrectRunsConcurrency.description: Will rebirth requests with this retryCount found in the log.
